images.copyright: Australian Christmas sandman on a white sand beach (© fogaas/iStock/Getty Images Plus)
images.title: Do you want to build a sandman?
images.caption: Christmas by the sea
images.desc: Although plenty of the Christmas tunes you’re sure to be blasting today speak of a winter wonderland, we’re used to quite the opposite. In fact, Christmas sandmen, like the adorable creation gracing our homepage today, aren’t an entirely uncommon sight as the heat of summer takes hold. That’s why many families and visitors take refuge at the nearest beach instead.
images.bsTitle: Do you want to build a sandman?
